mapper.select: select code , category, goods_name, prime_cost, real_price , stock, to_char(writedate , 'yyyy-mm-dd')writedate, sale_state from goods where to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')>=#{startDate} and to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')<=#{endDate}
select code , category, goods_name, prime_cost, real_price , stock, sale_count,to_char(writedate , 'yyyy-mm-dd')writedate, sale_state from goods where code = #{code}
